attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Look into changing tax allowance for Widows, When the main breadwinner dies, it is unfair that a widow has to pay the same tax as married women when there is only one wage coming in, it would make sense for them to receive the higher allowance that their husbands used to get

rejection.details: The title of a petition should request an action, not just be a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
